QuestData.Title: Memory Breach
QuestData.Description:
De memories of Akunda's followers rest within dis valley.
Most are best left forgotten, but dey may be our only chance to find out what happened to Akunda.
Look back upon de memories here. See if you can find any clues about what happened to our loa.
Be warned. Dis task is not for de weak. What you witness in dese memories can't be unseen.
QuestData.LogDescription: Look for clues within Unwanted Memories.
